dashboard.label: 可視化の移行 (グリッドモード)
dashboard.description: クラシックダッシュボードで使用される主な可視化オプション

Internal Server Error 数 / 全ての GET","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"xAxisTitleVisibility":"hide","yAxisTitleVisibility":"hide","y2AxisTitleVisibility":"show","showOverlayY2Axis":1,"y2Fields":["liner"],"y2AxisMax":10,"y2AxisMin":0,"y2AxisScale":"linear","overlayFields":[""Internal Server Error""],"dataValuesDisplay":"off","seriesColorsByField":{},"showSplitSeries":0,"legendDisplay":"bottom"},"context":{}},"viz_chart_3":{"type":"splunk.bar","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_8"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"チャートカラーオプション - 製品別購入件数","options":{"yAxisAbbreviation":"off","y2AxisAbbreviation":"off","showRoundedY2AxisLabels":false,"legendTruncation":"ellipsisMiddle","showY2MajorGridLines":true,"backgroundColor":"#475565","seriesColors":"[0xEBF0F5,0xC2D1E0,0x99B2CC,0x7094B8,0x4775A3,0x2E5C8A,0x24476B,0x1A334C,0x0F1F2E,0x050A0F]","legendDisplay":"bottom"}},"viz_chart_4":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_9"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"トレリスレイアウト - 曜日別アクション傾向","options":{},"context":{}},"viz_chart_5":{"options":{"gaugeColor":"> value | rangeValue(gaugeColorRangeValueContext)","value":"> primary | seriesByIndex(0) | lastPoint()"},"type":"splunk.fillergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_10"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Radial Gauge + パネル内 HTML 挿入 - 過去7日間の Internal Server Error 件数","context":{"gaugeColorRangeValueContext":[{"to":10,"value":"#5fbcff"},{"from":10,"to":30,"value":"#4beba8"},{"from":30,"to":50,"value":"#f4df7a"},{"from":50,"to":70,"value":"#fc9850"},{"from":70,"to":100,"value":"#ff7152"}]}},"viz_viz_1":{"type":"splunk.sankey","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_11"},"showProgressBar":true,"title":"Sankey ダイアグラム"},"viz_hZktZ8wG":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"- ソースコードを用いたオプションも含め基本的に移行が可能。
- 事後にレイアウト調整が必要だが、より視覚性の向上したデザインが簡単に実現できる。
- トレリスは今後実装予定。
- Sankey のように App が必要な可視化オプションもビルトイン化されている。
- パネル内 HTML コードを挿入すると動作しなくある。一度コードを除去して移行後にマークダウンを使用する。(グリッドモードはマークダウンのパネル挿入可能)
","backgroundColor":"#0877a6"}},"viz_rYhesRH8":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"過去7日間のInternal Server Error件数合計


2000件以上＝黄

3000件以上＝赤","fontColor":"#ffffff"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial method=GET
| eval kbytes = round(bytes/1024,2)
| timechart span=1h sum(kbytes)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@d","latest":"-3d@d"}},"name":"DS_SingleValue1"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial method=GET

| iplocation clientip
| timechart count by Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"DS_Column"},"ds_search_7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial method=GET
| timechart span=1h count as total count(eval(status ="500" OR status ="503" OR status ="504")) as "Internal Server Error"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-1w@w","latest":"@w"}},"name":"DS_Overlay"},"ds_search_8":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial action=purchase
| top productId","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"DS_ColorOption"},"ds_search_9":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial
| chart count by action date_wday","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"DS_Pie"},"ds_search_10":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial status=5*
